goal.en: Lean the fundamental laws of thermodynamics and kinetics and their applications in chemistry.
goal.ch: 學習熱力學及動力學基本定律及在化學上的應用

content.en:
This course covers two subjects: thermodynamics and chemical kinetics. We will focus on the following ten topics:
1. The Properties of Gases
2. The Fist Law of Thermodynamics
3. Thermochemistry
4. The Second and Third Laws of Thermodynamics
5. Physical Transformations of Pure Substances
6. Simple Mixture and Phase Diagram
7. Chemical Equilibrium
8. Molecules in Motion
9. The Rates of Chemical Reactions
10. The Chemical Kinetics of Complex Reaction
content.ch:
課程內容包括兩大主題:平衡熱力學及化學動力學。主要將介紹
1. 氣體性質
2. 熱力學第一定律
3. 熱化學
4. 熱力學第二及第三定律
5. Physical Transformations of Pure Substances
6. Simple Mixture and Phase Diagram
7. 化學平衡
8. 分子的運動
9. 化學反應速率
10. 複雜反應動力學

textbook.en:
“Peter Atkins ＆ Peter Atkins, Julio de Paula ＆ James Keeler, Physical Chemistry, International Edition
Reference: Thomas Engel ＆ Philip Reid, Physical Chemistry 3rd“
textbook.ch:
“主要教科書:
Peter Atkins, Julio de Paula ＆ James Keeler, Physical Chemistry, International Edition
參考教科書:
Thomas Engel ＆ Philip Reid, Physical Chemistry 3rd“

grading.en: First Exam: 34％; Second Exam: 33％; Final Exam: 34％;
grading.ch: 第一次期中考: 34％; 第二次期中考: 33％; 期末考: 33％。

To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習

ch.competency: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力
